item.title: Aboutme
item.description: Rainhu / intervalrain / 陣雨 Music, coding, and life. 音樂癒傷我的靈魂， 寫程式充實生命， 或許人生不過是電影或是一首歌吧。 About me Coding Leetcode Algorithm Music Streetvoice Youtube Contact 如果你想看到更多，請按讚，訂閱，並開啟我的…ㄟ不是！你可以 臉書 哎居 伊湄兒 推特 If you really wanna reach more contents, you can try to contact me with my Email My Facebook My Instagram My Twitter

item.title: First Blog
item.description: Here is how tow print “hello world” in different programming languages: Java class Hello{ public static void main(String[] args){ System.out.println("Hello World!"); } } C #include <stdio.h> int main(){ printf("Hello World!"); return 0; } C++ #include <iostream> int main(){ std::cout << "Hello World!" << std::endl; return 0; } C# namespace HelloWorld{ class Hello{ static void Main(String[] args){ System.Console.WriteLine("Hello World!"); } } } Python print("Hello World!

item.title: Helloworld
item.description: public static void main(String[] args){ System.out.println("Hello World!"); }
